Recruiter (1991) DVDRip - re-encoded
Original title: Recruiter
Year: 1991
Genre: Drama, thriller
Issued: Russia, Mentor Cinema
Director: Eduard Gavrilov
Cast: Lyubov Polishchuk, Alexander Mikhailov (I), Spartak Mishulin  Andrew Grads, Boris Tokarev (II), Valentin Smirnitskiy Andrew  Smolyakov Igor Bochkin, Mikhail Zhigalov, Irina Cherichenko

About the film: In the early 70s during the war in the Middle East, the Soviet military aircraft pilot Oleg Zorov was shot down. The officer was still alive but unconscious and was captured. After recovery, the Americans gave him political asylum. For twenty years, Zorov, who  became Alex Fred Kelly, worked for the CIA. And now, years later, he returns to his homeland, where there remained a sister and a lovely other woman.

This movie seems to deserve a better rating than it is given by IMDb, 
maybe because the DVD was made from a faded print. That is corrected 
here.
